mapper.select: SELECT HOS_NAME_KOR AS NAME_KOR, HOS_NAME_ENG AS NAME_ENG, TEL, HOS_COUNTRY AS COUNTRY, HOS_CITY AS CITY, HOS_DISTRICT AS DISTRICT, LOCATION, DETAIL FROM HOSPITAL WHERE HOS_COUNTRY= #{country} AND HOS_CITY= #{city} AND HOS_DISTRICT= #{district}

SELECT HOS_NAME_KOR AS NAME_KOR, HOS_NAME_ENG AS NAME_ENG, TEL, HOS_COUNTRY AS COUNTRY, HOS_CITY AS CITY, HOS_DISTRICT AS DISTRICT, LOCATION, DETAIL FROM HOSPITAL H, LANGUAGE L WHERE HOS_COUNTRY= #{country} AND HOS_CITY= #{city} AND HOS_DISTRICT= #{district} AND H.HOS_ID=L.HOS_ID AND LANGUAGE= #{language}
SELECT H.HOS_ID AS ID, H.HOS_NAME_KOR AS NAME_KOR, H.HOS_NAME_ENG AS NAME_ENG, TEL, LOCATION, DETAIL, EMAIL FROM HOSPITAL H, DEPARTMENT D WHERE H.HOS_ID = D.HOS_ID AND DEPT_NAME_ENG=#{deptName}
